articles.title: Kim Jong Il Meets Chinese Envoy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Meets Chinese Envoy
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il today met with State Councillor of the People's Republic of China Dai Bingguo who is special envoy of Hu Jintao, President of the PRC, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there was Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK.
					
					On the occasion, the special envoy courteously conveyed to Kim Jong Il a personal letter from Hu Jintao, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and President of the PRC. And he presented his own gift to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il expressed thanks for this and asked the special envoy to convey his regards to Hu Jintao. Then he conversed with the special envoy in an amicable atmosphere on the matter of invariably developing the friendly relations between the two countries and a series of issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam and Chinese Envoy Watch Opera
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam and Chinese Envoy Watch Opera
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, together with State Councillor of the People's Republic of China Dai Bingguo who is special envoy of Hu Jintao, President of the PRC, watched the Opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday.
					 Among the audience were Kang Nung Su, minister of Culture, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials of ministries and national institutions, artistes and working people in Pyongyang and the special envoy's party, Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Chinese embassy officials.
					
					 The opera, which had been created and performed in the 1960s, was successfully re-produced by the Phibada Opera Troupe this year, the "Year of DPRK-China Friendship." It was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the special envoy was conveyed to the performers, congratulating them on their success.

articles.title: Chinese Envoy Winds up Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Envoy Winds up Visit to DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- State Councillor of the People's Republic of China Dai Bingguo who is special envoy of Hu Jintao, President of the PRC, Friday left here for home by air after winding up his visit to the DPRK.
					 Leaving with him were Wu Dawei, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Fu Ziying, vice-minister of Commerce, Qiu Yuanping, vice-director of the Central Foreign Affairs Office, and Guo Yezhou, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
					
					 The special envoy and his party were seen off by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Before their departure, the special envoy and his party visited the Tower of the Juche Idea on Thursday.

articles.title: New DPRK Minister of Finance Appointed
articles.content:
New DPRK Minister of Finance Appointed
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly was promulgated to relieve the DPRK minister of Finance of his post and appoint a vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Finance.
					Kim Wan Su was relieved of his post as minister of Finance and Pak Su Gil was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Finance, according to the decree dated Sept. 18.

articles.title: Yukio Hatoyama Elected Japanese PM
articles.content:
Yukio Hatoyama Elected Japanese PM
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Yukio Hatoyama, president of the Democratic Party of Japan, was elected prime minister of Japan in a majority vote at the special Diet session held on Sept. 16.
					 This resulted in a formal launch of the Hatoyama Cabinet on the same day. 
					
					 Earlier, the Aso Cabinet resigned en masse.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Chile
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Chile
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Michelle Bachelet, President of Chile, on the occasion of its independence day. 
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished the president greater success in her work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Here
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Here
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Vietnam Journalists Association headed by Permanent Deputy President Le Quoc Trung and Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, arrived here Friday by air.

articles.title: Meeting to Remember Kim Jong Suk Held
articles.content:
Meeting to Remember Kim Jong Suk Held
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea "The great mother Kim Jong Suk of Songun Korea" took place at the Central Hall of Workers Friday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk. 
					The floor was taken by Ri Tong Hui, vice-chairperson of the Central Committee of the union, Kim Ok Sun, an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, Kim Pok Sin, honorary councilor of the Cabinet, Ju Sun Ok, rector of Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School, Ri Hyon Ju, director of Kim Jong Suk Nursery, and others.
					
					Speakers said that Kim Jong Suk's life was not only a life characterized by loyalty to President
						 Kim Il Sung but one of dedication to the country and its people.
					
					They looked back with deep emotion on the facts that Kim Jong Suk devotedly defended the headquarters of the revolution at the risk of her life like a citadel and shield, her noble revolutionary comradeship, boundlessly warm humanity and the undying exploits performed by her with arms to shine in the Songun revolutionary history of Juche.
					
					They stressed that the Korean people are immensely proud of being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation thanks to the feats Kim Jong Suk performed by giving birth to the loadstar of Juche in the tempest of the revolution.

articles.title: Russian Chorus Gives Its Premiere in Wonsan
articles.content:
Russian Chorus Gives Its Premiere in Wonsan
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M.E. Pyatnichki on a visit to the DPRK gave its premiere in Wonsan, Kangwon Province, on Sept. 17.
					The chorus put on the stage chorus and instrumental music "Cliff on the Bank of the River Volga", unaccompanied chorus "O Plain", song and dance "Before a Fireplace", female chorus and instrumental music "Snow" and other numbers in which the performers represented the Russian people's love for the motherland and their life and feelings with high artistry.
					
					Chorus "Seven Sons-in-Law", dance "Six Couples in the Ural", instrumental music "Valenki" and song and dance "In the Valley" and other numbers deeply impressed the audience.
					
					The performers sang well the Korean song "Arirang," delighting the audience.
					
					The performance goes on.

articles.title: Chongsonghyang Products Developed
articles.content:
Chongsonghyang Products Developed
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Natural Perfume Research Center has recently developed various chongsonghyang (green pine incense) products.
					A research team of the center manufactured natural health perfume products with highly medicinal efficacy by mixing the famous chongsonghyang with a certain amount of refined oil extracted from wormwood, fruit of Schizandra chinensis and other medicinal herbs which have been widely used among people from olden times.
					
					Keeping the medicinal properties as they are, the chongsonghyang mixed with medicinal wormwood oil is good for nervous diseases including nervous prostration and headache by computer work. In particular, it stabilizes blood pressure and treats cardiac neurosis.
					
					The chongsonghyang mixed with fruit of Schizandra chinensis extract, which had been regarded as health tonic, is an ideal perfume for the improvement of living environment and is potent for recovering the health of the bronchial asthma and pneumonia patients.
					
					The center has succeeded in making solid chongsonghyang, convenient and multi-applicable, with a new manufacturing technology.

articles.title: Historical Ferry Associated with Kim Jong Suk's Activities
articles.content:
Historical Ferry Associated with Kim Jong Suk's Activities
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Mangyang Ferry is located on the bank of the Tuman River flowing along the northern border of the DPRK, which conveys the immortal activities of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk to the generations to come.
					It is the historical ferry through which Kim Jong Suk crossed over the river to an alien land with her revolutionary family when she left her native place in the spring of Juche 11 (1922).
					
					Young as she was, she could not control her grief of leaving the fellow-countrymen who were deprived of the country by the brutal Japanese imperialists and were imposed upon the destiny of colonial slavery. She made up her mind to defeat Japanese imperialism and come back to the native village at the ferry.
					
					 Preserved in the ferry is the ferryboat used by her at that time and a monument to her revolutionary activities.
					
					 The ferry, which had witnessed tears and misfortunes in the by-gone days, is full of the happiness and joy of the people today.

articles.title: Unconverted Long-Term Prisoners Lead Worthwhile Life
articles.content:
Unconverted Long-Term Prisoners Lead Worthwhile Life
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Sixty-three unconverted long-term prisoners returned to the north nine years ago. They had unhesitatingly devoted their youth to the reunification of the country and fought without abandoning their faith and principles. 
					 When crossing over the military demarcation line, the modern medicine concluded that they would survive only for a few years. But they are still leading a worthwhile life, freely treading on the ground.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il brought about a "life switchover from hell to paradise" for them. He has showed all love and benevolence to them, saying to the following effect: It is my duty to make them take back the youth and spend their remaining years in glory and happiness.
					
					They became heroes of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and winners of the National Reunification Prize in the bosom of Kim Jong Il, the great sun of Songun.
					
					Literary and artistic works have been created with unconverted long-term prisoners as model to introduce their heroic deeds to the world and various legend-like stories are reported, including the news that they received birthday tables.
					
					They, therefore, are going of their own accord into the sites for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation with an ardent longing for      Kim Jong Il who bestows glory and happiness on them today, too, and with the will to repay to and devote themselves to the thankful motherland.
					
					In the period of the 150-day campaign they visited Kangson (Chollima Steel Complex), carrying with them their sincere assistance materials, and sang songs of faith and struggle to powerfully inspire the workers to increased steel production. 
					
					They have held meetings, art circle performances and painting and writing shows at scores of units across the country and thus excited the viewers.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures and film shows were held in Brazil, Iran, India and Indonesia from September 5 to 9 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					On display in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books introducing the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					The general secretary of the October 8 Revolutionary Movement of Brazil said at the meeting that the DPRK is the socialist country centered on the popular masses which was founded by Kim Il Sung and has been developed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The vice-president of the Committee for International Relations of the Iran Parties House in the lecture referred in detail to the factors by which the DPRK has displayed its dignity as the socialist fortress for more than 60 years.
					
					 The director of the P.T. Dwi Mitra Perkasa of Indonesia said in the lecture that the Korean people could lead an independent and worthwhile life as Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK. Today the DPRK has entered a new road of development under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 "The Faith of Korea" and other Korean films were appreciated at the film shows.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed in Austria
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed in Austria
 Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Austria issued a bulletin on September 9 to mark the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					The bulletin carried a photograph of President Kim Il Sung standing together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					The bulletin in an article said that Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory, liberating the country on Aug. 15, 1945. In the subsequent period he wisely led the Korean people to successfully carry out in a short span of time all democratic reforms including land reform, the nationalization of major industries and the enforcement of the Law on Sex Equality, it added.
					
					The DPRK was founded on Sept. 9, 1948 and Kim Il Sung elected head of state according to the unanimous will of all the Korean people, the bulletin noted, and continued: Kim Il Sung led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory.
					
					Pointing out that he dedicated all his life to the reunification of Korea and the cause of socialism, the bulletin stressed that his revolutionary exploits would last forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Remembered in Mexico
Pyongyang, September 18 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea published the 43rd issue of its bulletin carrying a photograph of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of her demise.
					The bulletin in an article titled "The ever-lasting memory of Kim Jong Suk" gave a detailed account of the fact that she set a noble example in upholding and defending President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Speaking highly of Kim Jong Suk's warm humanity and total dedication, her inborn disposition, the bulletin went on:
					
					The greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Suk is that she made sure that the cause of Kim Il Sung was successfully carried forward generation after generation.
					
					She helped with all her wisdom and energies General Secretary Kim Jong Il carry forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					True to her will, Kim Jong Il has carried forward the cause of Kim Il Sung, firmly defending socialism of Korea and ushering in a new era of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					Without the inspiration of Kim Jong Suk, the ever-victorious socialist Korea would have been unthinkable.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige construccion de Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el lugar de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					Primeramente, el Dirigente estuvo en el campo de construccion del dique de Ryongrim de la Central de Huichon No.1.
					
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano de planificacion de la construccion de la central, hizo el conocimiento detallado del estado de promocion de la obra recorriendo los lugares de la obra.
					
					Viendo estos grandiosos campos de construccion en animacion como si fuera un campo de gran batalla, senalo que comenzo a erguir una gran creacion en la garganta tranquila del monte Ryongrim durante unos meses apenas y se mostro muy satisfecho de que se acelera a la velocidad extraordinaria la construccion de la central.
					
					Gracias a la heroica lucha de los constructores militares erguira altamente en el futuro cercano el grandioso dique de la Central No .1 y se formara el gran lago artificial, subrayo y exhorto a desplegar el valiente combate de ataque para anticipar aquel dia de victoria.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio el lugar de construccion del dique de la Central de Huichon No.2.
					
					Escucho la explicacion ante el panorama de la central e hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de la promocion de la obra recorriendo el lugar de construccion.
					
					Al ver el dique que surge en cada minuto y cada segundo expreso gran satisfaccion de que los constructores militares hayan logrado resonantes exitos en la obra de dique librando el trabajo tridimensional con el metodo del trabajo eficiente y evaluo altamente sus proezas. 
					
					Por contar con los heroicos militares infinitamente fieles al partido y la revolucion, podemos realizar a nuestro antojo la gran transformacion secular de la naturaleza, dijo y continuo que esto deviene la riqueza y prosperidad de que pueden disfrutar solo nuestro partido y pueblo.
					
					Agrego que cada minuto y segundo en este lugar de construccion son precisamente saltos e innovaciones y en el crisol de tal entusiasmo se crea incesantemente el milagro que asombra a todo el mundo.
					
					Asevero orgullosamente que esta gran velocidad es precisamente la nueva velocidad de Chollima, o sea "la velocidad de Huichon" basada en el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, cimiento de la politica del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					Tras recorrer los lugares de construccion el Dirigente presento en el terreno las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para terminar con anticipacion la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon.
					
					Menciono que solucionar satisfactoriamente el problema de electricidad es la tarea mas primordial que se presenta en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Enfatizo que todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo deben movilizarse y hacer ingentes esfuerzos por poner fin a esta obra antes del ano 2012.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que los constructores de la central, al poner de pleno manifiesto el heroismo masivo y la abnegacion simpar, terminaran incondicionalmente hasta 2012 la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon y responderan con orgullosas proezas a la confianza y la esperanza del partido.
					
					En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang Pak To Chun, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il se reune con el enviado especial de Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il se reune con el enviado especial de Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio en audiencia el dia 18 al consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, y su comitiva, de visita en Corea.
					Estuvo presente alli el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju.
					
					En la ocasion el enviado especial entrego con cortesia al Dirigente la carta personal de Hu Jintao, secretario general del CC del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la RPCh y el presente preparado por el.
					
					El Dirigente expreso agradecimiento al respecto y rogo al enviado especial que le transmitiera al presidente chino su saludo.
					
					 Departio con el huesped chino en un ambiente cordial sobre el problema de desarrollar invariablemente las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam y Dai Bingguo presencian una opera
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam y Dai Bingguo presencian una opera
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y el consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, presenciaron el dia 17 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la opera "El sueno en la camara roja".
					Les acompanaron en verla el ministro de Cultura Kang Nung Su, el vicecanciller Kim Yong Il, los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales, los artistas, los trabajadores, la comitiva del enviado especial, el embajador Liu Xiaoming y otros  miembros de la embajada china acreditados en Corea.
					
					La funcion fue aplaudida efusivamente por parte de los espectadores porque el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre volvio a crear magnificamente en este ano de "Amistad Corea-China" la opera creada y presentada en la decada de 1960.
					
					Un cesto de flores a nombre del enviado especial fue entregado a los ejecutantes en saludo al exito de su funcion.

articles.title: Parte de regreso Dai Bingguo
articles.content:
Parte de regreso Dai Bingguo
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, enviado especial del presidente de la Republica Popular China, Hu Jintao, partio el dia 18 por via aerea de esta capital luego de terminar la visita a Corea.
					Le acompanaron el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Wu Dawei, el viceministro de Comercio Fu Ziying, el subdirector de la Oficina Central de los Asuntos Exteriores Qiu Yuanping, el asistente del jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China Guo Yezhou.
					
					Los huespedes chinos fueron despedidos por el vicecanciller coreano Kim Yong Il y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Xiaoming, acreditado en Corea.
					
					El dia 17, el enviado especial y su comitiva recorrieron el Monumento a la Idea Juche.

articles.title: Nombrado Pak Su Gil como ministro de Finanzas
articles.content:
Nombrado Pak Su Gil como ministro de Finanzas
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Segun el decreto fechado 18 del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el ministro de Finanzas Kim Wan Su fue destituido, y Pak Su Gil, nombrado como vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros y ministro de Finanzas.

articles.title: Electo Yukio Hatoyama como premier japones
articles.content:
Electo Yukio Hatoyama como premier japones
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En Japon, Yukio Hatoyama, representante del Partido Democratico fue electo como premier.
					En la eleccion del premier efectuada el dia 16 en la sesion especial de la Dieta, el obtuvo la mayoria de votos a favor, se dice.
					
					Por lo tanto, el mismo dia, fue establecido oficialmente el gabinete de  Hatoyama.
					
					Con anterioridad, el gabinete de Aso fue retirado totalmente.

articles.title: Escena de las miembros de UMDC para recordar a Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Escena de las miembros de UMDC para recordar a Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 18 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En ocasion del 60o aniversario del fallecimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa, Kim Jong Suk, las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC) realizaron este viernes en la Casa Central de Obreros la escena de recordacion intitulada "Gran madre Kim Jong Suk de Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar)".
					Se presentaron en la escena Ri Tong Hui, vicepresidenta del CC de la UMDC, Kim Ok Sun, ex combatiente revolucionaria antijaponesa, Kim Pok Sin, consejera honoraria del Consejo de Ministros, Ju Sun Ok, directora de la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok, y Ri Hyon Ju, directora de la Casa Cuna Kim Jong Suk, etc.
					
					Las oradoras dijeron que la vida de Kim Jong Suk fue la de fidelidad al Presidente Kim Il Sung y la de la abnegacion a la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Recordaron con emocion que ella defendio a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion siendo el baluarte y el escudo y se refirieron a la sublime camaraderia revolucionaria y el infinito sentimiento humano de la Heroina e inmortales proezas que brillaran junto con las fuerzas armadas en la historia de la original revolucion del Songun.
					
					Enfatizaron que gracias a las proezas de           ella quien en medio del torbellino de la revolucion crio al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como la estrella-guia del Juche, el pueblo coreano pudo disfrutar de generacion en generacion de la fortuna de enaltecer al gran lider y al gran dirigente.
